explains: vt. 命令；吩咐；嘱咐；禁止

sentences.en: Paretic in, enjoin limb knees hip flexor.
sentences.cn: 患侧在上，嘱患肢屈膝屈髋。

sentences.en: And can it be that good policy does not equally enjoin it?
sentences.cn: 而良好的政策不也是一样要求这种行为吗？

sentences.en: "One thing, thou that wast my wife, I would enjoin upon thee," continued the scholar.
sentences.cn: “既然你曾经是我的妻子，我要求你必须做到一点，”那学者继续说。
